column2: {'current': 'Director Engineering at Adobe Systems', 'locality': u'Bengaluru Area, India', 'skills': [u'Data Center', u'File Systems', u'C', u'Debugging', u'Device Drivers', u'Embedded Systems', u'Mobile Systems', u'Compiler', u'Technology Management', u'Mobile Platforms', u'Compilers', u'RTOS', u'Algorithms'], 'industry': u'Computer Software', 'lname': u'P.N', 'project-descriptions': [u'I am building a compiler/runtime framework for HTML5 named Druta as my weekend work.
